name: Marvel vs. Capcom: Infinite - Mystic Masters Costume Pack
name_original: Marvel vs. Capcom: Infinite - Mystic Masters Costume Pack
description: The Mystic Masters Costume Pack includes Premium Costumes for the following characters: Doctor Strange, Dormammu, Ghost Rider, Morrigan, Firebrand and Nemesis. Costumes are also available for individual purchase. Marvel vs. Capcom: Infinite required; not included.
